author: @multiplayerit
title: Grosso guaio per OpenAI: cancellati dati chiave nella causa contro il New York Times
text: OpenAI, l'azienda che ha creato ChatGPT, è stata accusata di aver cancellato dati cruciali in una causa legale intentata dal The New York Times e da altri importanti quotidiani. La controversia riguarda l'utilizzo di articoli giornalistici per l'addestramento dei modelli di intelligenza artificiale di OpenAI, un tema che solleva importanti questioni sul copyright e sulla proprietà intellettuale nell'era digitale. Secondo quanto riportato, i legali dei quotidiani avrebbero trascorso oltre 150 ore ad analizzare i dati di addestramento di OpenAI per identificare gli articoli inclusi. Tuttavia, a causa di un errore non meglio specificato, queste prove sarebbero state cancellate. Dati cancellati per errore: uno sfortunato glitch OpenAI ha ammesso l'errore, ma il tentativo di recuperare i dati si è dimostrato poco efficace: le informazioni recuperate risultano infatti incomplete e inaffidabili, compromettendo la possibilità di stabilire con precisione come gli articoli siano stati utilizzati nello sviluppo dei modelli di intelligenza artificiale. Gli avvocati della compagnia hanno parlato di dati cancellati per colpa di un generico "glitch", ma quelli del New York Times non hanno avanzato sospetti di dolo, affermando che "non hanno motivo di credere" che la cancellazione sia stata volontaria. La causa, intentata lo scorso dicembre da The New York Times Company, sostiene che OpenAI e il suo partner Microsoft abbiano utilizzato illegalmente milioni di articoli per addestrare i loro strumenti di intelligenza artificiale, creando una concorrenza sleale con gli editori. Il New York Times chiede un risarcimento di miliardi di dollari per danni. Sebbene l'utilizzo di opere protette da copyright senza autorizzazione rappresenti una chiara violazione delle leggi in vigore in gran parte le mondo, la complessità dei processi di addestramento dell'IA rende difficile stabilire con esattezza l'origine dei dati e la loro influenza sui modelli finali. La vicenda si inserisce così in un contesto più ampio di dibattito sull'impatto dell'intelligenza artificiale sul mondo dell'informazione. Voi che cosa ne pensate? Diteci la vostra nei commenti qua sotto, mentre [OpenAI aggiorna il modello GPT-4o, che si riconferma il migliore in Chatbot Arena](/notizie/openai-aggiorna-il-modello-gpt-4o-che-si-riconferma-il-migliore-in-chatbot-arena.html).

author: @Live_Hindustan
title: मथुरा में शादीशुदा दोस्त ने महिला की गला दबाकर की हत्या, आरोपी गिरफ्तार
text:
मथुरा में शादीशुदा दोस्त ने महिला की गला दबाकर की हत्या, आरोपी गिरफ्तार
यूपी के मथुरा में कोतवाली थाना क्षेत्र के अंतर्गत कृष्णानगर स्थित रामनगर में बुधवार शाम युवक ने अपनी महिला दोस्त से विवाद होने पर उसकी गला दबाकर हत्या कर दी। सूचना पर पहुंची पुलिस ने मौका मुआयना किया। फोरेंसिक टीम ने जांच को नमूने इकट्ठा किए।
Srishti Kunjहिन्दुस्तान टीम, आगरा/मथुराThu, 17 July 2025 10:20 AM
यूपी के मथुरा में कोतवाली थाना क्षेत्र के अंतर्गत कृष्णानगर स्थित रामनगर में बुधवार शाम युवक ने अपनी महिला दोस्त से विवाद होने पर उसकी गला दबाकर हत्या कर दी। सूचना पर पहुंची पुलिस ने मौका मुआयना किया। फोरेंसिक टीम ने जांच को नमूने इकट्ठा किए। मृतका के भाई ने रिपोर्ट दर्ज कराई है। आरोपी गिरफ्तार कर लिया गया है।
पुलिस ने बताया, मोनिका कृष्णानगर स्थित कॉस्मेटिक की दुकान पर काम करती थी। दुकान पर फतेहपुर सीकरी (आगरा) निवासी राहुल मेहंदी लगाने व टैटू बनाने का काम करता था। यहीं दोनों की दोस्ती हो गई। मिलना-जुलना शुरू हो गया। बुधवार शाम किसी विवाद पर राहुल ने किराये के मकान में मोनिका की गला दबाकर हत्या कर दी।
सूचना पर कोतवाली प्रभारी निरीक्षक व कृष्णानगर चौकी प्रभारी पुलिस बल के साथ मौके पर पहुंच गए। फोरेंसिक टीम को बुलाया गया। टीम ने मौके से साक्ष्य संकलन किया। एसपी सिटी राजीव कुमार सिंह, सीओ सिटी भूषण वर्मा भी वहां पहुंच गए और घटना की जानकारी ली। पुलिस आरोपी को गिरफ्तार कर पूछताछ कर रही है। फिलहाल हत्या का मकसद साफ नहीं हो सका है।
मथुरा में किराये पर कमरा लेकर रह रहा था राहुल
पुलिस के अनुसार फतेहपुरसीकरी, निवासी राहुल रामनगर में किराए का कमरा लेकर रहता था। रामनगर में ही मोनिका परिवार के साथ रहती थी। बुधवार को युवक के किराये के कमरे पर मोनिका और राहुल थे।
एक दुकान पर करते थे काम दोनों की ढाई साल से दोस्ती
कोतवाली प्रभारी निरीक्षक देव पाल सिंह ने बताया कि युवक व युवती दोनों एक ही दुकान पर काम करते थे। इनके मध्य करीब ढाई साल से दोस्ती थी। राहुल शादीशुदा था, मोनिका अविवाहित थी। संबंधों को लेकर पुलिस जांच कर रही है।
मोनिका की मौत पर रामनगर में मचा हड़कंप
रामनगर में युवती की मौत की सूचना पर वहां हड़कंप मच गया। कमरे में मोनिका का शव होने की जानकारी होने पर घबराए हुए परिजन भी वहां पहुंच गए। खबर फैली तो आसपास के लोगों की भीड़ वहां एकत्र हो गई। मृतका के भाई की तहरीर पर राहुल के खिलाफ हत्या की रिपोर्ट पुलिस ने दर्ज कर ली और आरोपी राहुल को गिरफ्तार कर लिया। पुलिस उससे पूछताछ कर रही है।

author: Chad Gillis
title: Gopher tortoises are making a return to Bowditch Beach
text: Chad Gillis They have stumpy legs with strong feet designed for digging massive holes in sandy dunes. Gopher tortoises are among Florida's most ancient-looking critters, and they thrive at places like Bowditch Point Park at the north end of Fort Myers Beach. Bowditch has plenty of grassy hills, perfect places for gopher tortoises to dig out their fortresses; but it's thought that many or all of the tortoises that were there were washed away by Hurricane Ian in September 2022. At least one gopher tortoise (Gopherus polyphemus) survived the storm or was transported to the park afterwards as one was recently photographed by The News-Press. The only tortoise native to Florida, gopher tortoises are icons on tall, hilly dunes and scrubby pine and palmetto uplands. They're long-lived animals that mature around the same rate as humans. From tiny to 90 "Gopher tortoises can live 40 to 60 years in the wild, though captive tortoises may live 90-plus years," an FWC website says. "Males reach adulthood at approximately 9 to 12 years of age, whereas a female may take 10 to 21 years to reach maturity depending on local resource abundance and latitude." Listed as threatened by the state, gopher tortoises are most active during the warmer months. Hatchlings are smaller than a nectarine, and they're considered juveniles when their carapace (shell) reaches 2-and-a-half inches in length, according to the Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission, the state agency charged with protecting wildlife and habitat. At that age and size their shells are still soft, and the coloration is mostly yellow to almost orange. They're subadults when they reach 5 inches in length, and their shells are starting to harden. The coloration at this stage turns much darker, into a dark olive green to grey. More: [Reporter finds flamingo haven on recent 11-day Everglades canoe trip](/story/news/environment/2024/01/31/from-0-to-100-reporter-keeps-seeing-flamingos-in-florida-along-with-crocodiles-manatees/72310935007/) At 7 inches they become adults, and by this point their coloration is anywhere from gray to dark chocolate brown, according to FWC. "The gopher tortoise is a moderate-sized, terrestrial turtle, averaging 9 to 11 inches in length when fully grown, though it can reach lengths of up to 15 inches," an FWC website reads. "The species is identifiable by its stumpy, elephantine hind feet and flattened, shovel-like forelimbs covered in thick scales." Tortoise burrows serve as habitat for other Florida animals FWC says they spend about 80% of their lives in their burrows, which have an average length of 15 feet. These burrows eventually become home to all sorts of animals, and they are climate controlled, to a degree. "Their burrows maintain a stable temperature and humidity year-round, providing protection from extreme temperatures, drought, and fire," FWC says. They eat low-lying vegetation like long-leafed grasses and legumes, and they don't drink a lot of water. "They typically forage within 160 feet of their burrow but will travel farther if forage is unavailable," FWC says. "Gopher tortoises may drink water that has pooled following a rainstorm, but generally consume an adequate amount of water from forage plants." More: [Millions of birds aren't feeding on Florida's largest lake. What is going wrong?](/story/news/environment/2024/02/01/more-el-nino-rains-could-lead-to-lake-releases-for-caloosahatchee/72399649007/) Threats to the species come mostly from humans and development, according to a federal agency responsible for protecting wildlife and habitat. "Primary threats to the gopher tortoise are fragmentation, destruction and modification of its habitat, including urbanization," a U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service website reads. "Other threats include mortality due to vehicle strikes; effects of climate change including increased drought and extreme high temperatures, sea level rise and migration of human populations from inundated coastal areas; and nonnative invasive species, disease and predation, mainly on nests and hatchlings." Connect with this reporter: Chad Gillis on Facebook.

author: Alex Co
title: Fallout 4 PS5 and Xbox Series X|S Versions Out April 25, New Content and Update Details Revealed
text:
With Amazon Prime’s Fallout TV series now out, Bethesda is riding the hype train with Fallout 4. Released back in 2015, the studio has announced the Fallout 4 PS5 and Xbox Series X|S versions will be available on April 25 as a free upgrade to existing game owners.
Fallout 4 PS5 and Xbox Series X|S Version Features: Will feature Performance and Quality mode settings Stability improvements and fixes 60 frames-per-second and increased resolutions Those on PS4 and Xbox One, expect a title update to usher in stability improvements, login and quest fixes.
PC players won’t be left out of the update roll out, as Bethesda plans to roll out an update for PC!
Fallout 4 Upcoming PC Update Features: Widescreen and ultra widescreen support incoming Fixes to Creation Kit Quest updates Stability, mod and bug fixes Japanese and Chinese language players on PC will have Bethesda.net login issues resolved fixing access to mods Fallout 4 will also be available on the Epic Games Store, and will also be Steam Deck verified.
The Fallout 4 support isn’t stopping there. Bethesda will also introduce new Creation Club items with the update.
Enclave Remnants
Enclave Remnants brings the Pre-War cabal, The Enclave, into the Fallout 4 storyline. In this new quest, “Echoes of the Past,” can you stop The Enclave from spreading their dangerous ideology and gaining a foothold in the Commonwealth?
Along with workshop items and the Enclave Colonel uniform, we are including the following previously released Creation Club content:
Enclave Weapon Skins Enclave Armor Skins Tesla Cannon Hellfire Power Armor X-02 Power Armor Heavy Incinerator Makeshift Weapon Pack
Ever thought a piggy bank would make a great weapon in a pinch? This weapon pack includes a variety of unconventional objects that have been transformed into deadly weapons, such as: a baseball launcher, a nail gun and a piggy bank.
Halloween Workshop
Leftover from an ill-fated Halloween party, thrown by the New England Technocrat Society, these 38 new Halloween decorations include witches, cauldrons, ghouls and more! Decorate for Halloween or make your settlements spooky all year round!
Once the update is out, we’ll be sure to let our readers know. If you’re not sure whether to watch the Fallout TV series on Amazon, go read our Season 1 review to see what we thought of it,
